name: Introduction to Employment Relations
description: An introduction to the study of the world of work and employment, the history and development of employment relations, its central theories and concepts; the behaviours, outcomes, practices and institutions that emerge from or affect the employment relationship; contemporary issues and comparative employment relations systems.
department: Centre for Industrial Relations and Human Resources
prerequisites: Enrolment in the Industrial Relations & Human Resources program (ASSPE/ASMAJ1536) or 4.0 FCEs and a minimum cgpa of 2.3.
